name: NatureVista Haven
description: Immerse yourself in a green oasis with this eco-conscious residence, featuring smart gardening, water purification, and energy-harvesting pathways.

features.name: Intelligent Garden Oasis
features.description: Automated irrigation based on plant needs, creating a lush and thriving outdoor space.

features.name: Butterfly Meadows
features.description: Dedicated garden sections designed to attract and nurture butterflies, adding a touch of nature to your backyard.

features.name: Air-Purifying Sanctuary
features.description: Indoor plants strategically placed for air purification, ensuring a fresh and healthy living environment.

name: AquaHarbor Retreat
description: Experience water purity at its finest with this residence featuring state-of-the-art water purification systems and serene aquatic landscapes.

features.name: Bio-Cleansing Technology
features.description: Utilizes bio-engineered filters to cleanse water from harmful pathogens, providing crystal-clear water for various household uses.

features.name: Tranquil Floating Gardens
features.description: A beautifully designed pond with floating gardens that not only enhance aesthetics but also naturally filter and purify the water.

features.name: On-the-Go Purification
features.description: Compact and portable water purification units, perfect for outdoor adventures or emergencies.

name: EcoEnergia Estate
description: Live in harmony with nature with this residence featuring energy-harvesting pathways, adaptive lighting, and interactive outdoor elements.

features.name: Pathway Power Stations
features.description: Stores energy generated from footsteps during the day, providing sustainable illumination for pathways and nearby areas at night.

features.name: Smart Illumination System
features.description: Lights that automatically adjust based on natural light and movement, optimizing energy consumption while keeping your surroundings well-lit.

features.name: Interactive Outdoor Experience
features.description: Engage with your outdoor space through interactive ground projections, turning your garden into a dynamic and entertaining environment.

name: GreenLiving Retreat
description: Embrace a sustainable lifestyle with this residence, complemented by a digital platform offering educational courses on eco-friendly practices.

features.name: Hands-On Green Workshops
features.description: Participate in DIY sessions covering everything from waste upcycling to creating and maintaining your own eco-friendly garden.

features.name: Nature Education for All Ages
features.description: Tailored courses for residents and children, promoting awareness of nature conservation, renewable energy, and biodiversity.

features.name: Green Living Webinars
features.description: Join online sessions with experts in sustainable living, green architecture, and eco-technology, fostering a community of like-minded residents.
